variableMeasured.name: Screen Time
variableMeasured.description:
Screen Time	Integer	N	1	Average weekday hours of screen time per day.
1=1 hour or less
2=2 hours
3=3 hours
4=4 or more hours	2

variableMeasured.name: Mental Health Professional Treatment
variableMeasured.description: Child either “Needs Treatment” or “Does Not Need Treatment”

variableMeasured.name: Mental Health Care – Not Received
variableMeasured.description: Mental Health Care – Not Received	Text		23	Child either “Needs Treatment” or “Does Not Need Treatment”	Does Not Need Treatment

variableMeasured.name: Age
variableMeasured.description: Age of child in years between 0 and 17
